name: Drako 600D Medium Sports Bag
description:
The Drako 600D Medium Sports Bag is perfect for the athlete on the go. This large sports bag is the ideal size for carrying all your gear to and from the gym. Made with nylon canvas fabric and a quality heavy duty zipper, this bag is durable and built to last.

Drako 600D Medium Sports Bag Details:
Durable nylon fabric
4 air vents to ensure breathability
Padded shoulder strap
Heavy duty zipper and track system
24″ x 12″ x 12″
 

Product Description:
Designed for functionality
The Drako 600D Medium Sports Bag has many design features that make it a practical and highly functional for athletes. Its heavy duty nylon fabric makes it extremely durable, meaning that it can withstand all the wear and tear required for a high quality sports bag. The heavy duty zipper and track system also means that you’ll never have to worry about the zipper breaking or coming apart.

We all know that athletic gear can become saturated in sweat and has the tendency to smell when packed into a confined space. Due to this unpleasant problem, this bag has 4 mesh vents that allow airflow throughout the bag. This means that your bag and your equipment are less likely to smell, and it will also reduce any chances of mildew growth. The inner lining also makes it easy to wipe down, helping to keep it clean and smelling good.

Measuring at 24″ x 12″ x 12″ (60cm x 30cm x 30cm), this bag is an ideal size to carry all your essential training needs to and from the gym.

All Drako products are manufactured to the highest standards of quality, using both durable materials and innovative design. Drako also ensures that all factories that manufacture their products are ISO approved. This means that the factories meet acceptable, safe, and humane working conditions for labourers.
